posts.title: Finally, I complete all course from IBM data engineering
posts.excerpt: From this course, I’ve learned a lot of things about what a data engineer is and increased my exposure to essential skills needed. Here are the skills I have learnt from this course: Python programming, Data analysis, RDBMS, Shell scripting, Data warehousing, ETL/ELT, Data pipelines, BI, Big data, Machine Learning as shown in the course lists
posts.content:
From this course, I’ve learned a lot of things about what a data engineer is and increased my exposure to essential skills needed. Here are the skills I have learnt from this course: Python programming, Data analysis, RDBMS, Shell scripting, Data warehousing, ETL/ELT, Data pipelines, BI, Big data, Machine Learning as shown in the course lists

Doing hands-on labs, I learn to code and use the tools such as Jupyter notebook for data analysis, MySQL & PostgreSQL for SQL, MongoDB for NoSQL, etc.

projects.title: MOBILE RASPBERRY PI REMOTE CONTROLLING
projects.subtitle: Embedded system
projects.excerpt: I have discuss about the project “Mobile Raspberry Pi Remote Controlling” with Dr. Vincent Guyot at ESIEA. To know what is Raspberry Pi and what it can do I have learn from raspberrypi.org site. First I learnt how to install “Raspbian OS” to work with Raspberry Pi. Raspbian is an unofficial of Debian wheezy and will run on the Raspberry Pi. I install Raspbian on the SD card after that plug the SD card into the Raspberry Pi board to use it.
projects.content:
I have discuss about the project “Mobile Raspberry Pi Remote Controlling” with Dr. Vincent Guyot at ESIEA. To know what is Raspberry Pi and what it can do I have learn from raspberrypi.org site. First I learnt how to install “Raspbian OS” to work with Raspberry Pi. Raspbian is an unofficial of Debian wheezy and will run on the Raspberry Pi. I install Raspbian on the SD card after that plug the SD card into the Raspberry Pi board to use it.

I have learnt how to communicate between the Wii Remote and Raspberry Pi. At first, I receive bluetooth usb and Wii Remote from professor. The Wii Remote can connect to Raspberry Pi by bluetooth device. I setup the bluetooth on Raspberry Pi by plug it into the usb slot and install bluetooth package by this command line “sudo apt-get install –no-install-recommends bluetooth”. When the bluetooth package already installed in the Raspberry Pi, I can check the bluetooth status by type “sudo service bluetooth status” in command line. If bluetooth is working the terminal will show message “bluetooth is running”. To detect Wii remote on Raspberry Pi I have to type “hcitool scan” if Wii Remote was found it will show a message like “00:1E:02:8A:CD:A1 Nintendo RVL-CNT-01” on the screen. Before using Wii remote with raspberry pi I have to install CWIID MODULE by type “sudo apt-get install python-cwiid” and we have test its with the sample code on Raspberry Pi website.

For the last, I have to write the program in C & Python to control the robotics with Wiimote. The program will check the setupGPIO and then print the message to wait for a connection from Wiimote. If the connection succeeds the Wiimote will rumble and show the usage buttons message but during connection time out the program will quit. When Wiimote has connected successfully if the home button was pressed the program will start and the program will check buttons to control the directional movement of the robotic car. The program will work until the home button was pressed again.

The program show Wiimote is connected and how to use

You can use buttons or gyroscope to command the robot. Press button B to change mode between buttons and gyroscope

projects.title: HEALTH ME PLEASE
projects.subtitle: iOS Application
projects.excerpt: Healthy Me Please is an application on smartphone that a user could record his/her daily routine such as running, cycling, and calories burned. This application will be able to work with wearable devices like Fitbit, Pebble for tracking people’s activities record from their workout. The data from activities tracking will be stored in the application and could be shared to social network. There is also the challenge system, which a user can challenge other user to complete a healthcare mission and will receive unlocked badges as rewards if the mission complete, and earn the points to be ranked with other users.
projects.content:
Healthy Me Please is an application on smartphone that a user could record his/her daily routine such as running, cycling, and calories burned. This application will be able to work with wearable devices like Fitbit, Pebble for tracking people’s activities record from their workout. The data from activities tracking will be stored in the application and could be shared to social network. There is also the challenge system, which a user can challenge other user to complete a healthcare mission and will receive unlocked badges as rewards if the mission complete, and earn the points to be ranked with other users.

Healthy Me Please developed in iOS. In parts of connection between application on smartphone and wearable, we will use libraries and API for wearable device to get a wearable device detected by a smartphone via Bluetooth. In the future, the application will be developed for more add-ons support and wearable devices compatibility to make it better because some wearable devices don’t support some smartphone’s operating system by now.

Software architecture

Database design

projects.title: BARISTA
projects.subtitle: Coffee maker
projects.excerpt: During year as a college student, I worked as a part-time barista at 2 small cafes. In my time as a barista, I came to understand a lot about myself as an employee. Learning a lot of new things and improve my communication skills with people. From this experience help me to make connections, teach me to work as a team, and dealing with uncontrollable situations
projects.content:

projects.title: DATABASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR STOCK PHOTOGRAPHY WEBSITE
projects.subtitle: RDBMS & Web Application
projects.excerpt: Develop and design of database management system for stock photography website. The photographer’s photo distribution channel is often in a form of selling each photo with the buyer contacting the photographer directly to buy the photo. The photographer will record each transaction possibly in a document file format or paper form. In the traditional recording system, many problems occur such as misinformation and information loss due to a high amount of photos. From this issue, a database management system for stock photography is created by using the Oracle 11G program to manage the database with the PHP language in web application development. The application is connected to the database system. It is found that photographers can manage their own photos into categories. The total sales report or sales history report can be exported.
projects.content:
Develop and design of database management system for stock photography website. The photographer’s photo distribution channel is often in a form of selling each photo with the buyer contacting the photographer directly to buy the photo. The photographer will record each transaction possibly in a document file format or paper form. In the traditional recording system, many problems occur such as misinformation and information loss due to a high amount of photos. From this issue, a database management system for stock photography is created by using the Oracle 11G program to manage the database with the PHP language in web application development. The application is connected to the database system. It is found that photographers can manage their own photos into categories. The total sales report or sales history report can be exported.

ER diagram

projects.title: KROBKRUAYA
projects.subtitle: B2B e-Commerce website
projects.excerpt: Krobkruaya.com is an e-commerce website that provides pharmaceutical and healthcare products in a business-to-business model. The website was developed on the Magento commerce platform.
